summary: After the shocking murder of her mother, a girl helps a police detective by searching her home for clues that they hope will lead to the perpetrator.
cast: Tess Atkins|Tom Cavanagh|Boris Kodjoe|William deVry|MacKenzie Porter|Anne Marie DeLuise|Alex Ferris|Michelle Creber|Adam DiMarco|David Lewis|Michael Kopsa|Aliyah O'Brien|Greg Webb|Gavin Cooke|Olivia Cheng|Craig Veroni|P. Lynn Johnson|Anna Galvin|Reese Alexander|Linda Ko|Nelson Wong|Zahra Alani|Dawn Chubai|Simon Chin|Grayson Gabriel
title: Un asesino entre nosotros
